video.title: Puffin Rock
video.synopsis: Life is sweet on beautiful Puffin Rock, where puffling Oona, her baby brother Baba and their pals learn about nature, friendship and family.

episodes.synopsis: Oona tries to teach her baby brother Baba how to be a grown-up puffin. The kids find a strange egg. Oona wants everyone to see the full moon.
episodes.title: Puffin Practice / The Mystery Egg / To See the Moon

episodes.synopsis: Oona and Baba attract unwanted attention with a shell, make an unexpected friend, and then search far and wide for new bedding.
episodes.title: The Shiny Shell / Friendly Flynne / A Feather Bed

episodes.synopsis: Baba wants to help a baby seagull trapped in plastic twine. Mossy's berry pile gets scattered. Oona takes her first night trip to the sea by herself.
episodes.title: Beach Rescue / Lost Berries / Night Lights

episodes.synopsis: Baba and Oona go to the muddy spring pond. Oona tries to keep a close eye on the seagulls. Oona and Silky search for a new shell for Bernie.
episodes.title: Pond Life / Bird Detective / Bernie's Shell

episodes.synopsis: May and Mossy teach Oona to appreciate her abilities. Oona and Silky try to play underwater. A very vocal bird causes problems at bedtime.
episodes.title: Hop, Skip and Bump / Bouncing Back / A Noisy Neighbour

episodes.synopsis: Oona and Baba get stuck in a seagull nest. Baba can't wait to have a snack. Mama shows Oona how to find her singing voice.
episodes.title: Stormy Weather / Baba's Adventure / Rock Music

episodes.synopsis: Baba, May and Oona have an underground race. Oona and Baba help Silky after a storm. Otto joins Oona and Baba on a mission.
episodes.title: The Burrow Race / Silky's Slide / Ruffled Feathers

episodes.synopsis: Silky, Baba, Oona and the underwater critters have to help Bernie. Everything gets topsy-turvy on a foggy day. Oona wants to take off from the sea.
episodes.title: Finding Bernie / The Foggy Day / Run, Flap, Fly

episodes.synopsis: Oona wrangles the Shrew Crew to clear a tunnel. Oona searches for the perfect hiding place. Oona and Silky find a lost whale.
episodes.title: Follow the Puffin / Spot the Puffin / The Sad Whale

episodes.synopsis: Baba wants to keep up with a quick-flapping hummingbird moth. Baba befriends a caterpillar. Oona tries to teach Baba how to fly.
episodes.title: The Fast Day / Baba's Friend / Flying High

episodes.synopsis: Silky watches over a seahorse family in the lagoon. Mossy wants Flynne's fur to keep him warm on a cold day. Baba and Mossy make a picnic.
episodes.title: Silky's Seahorses / Keeping Cosy / Baba's Picnic

episodes.synopsis: The puffins take a family trip to the underwater cave. Oona and Silky spy on the red crabs. The owls come to play with Oona and Baba.
episodes.title: Cave Camping / The Empty Shell / Three's a Crowd

episodes.synopsis: Mossy tries a different way of living. Oona and Baba stay with May during a rainstorm. The owls have Oona and Baba over for a slumber party.
episodes.title: Mossy Goes Solo / Flooded Burrow / Daytime Sleepover
